name: Margarita
ingredients: Tequila, triple sec, lime juice, salt for rimming
instructions: Shake tequila, triple sec, and lime juice with ice. Strain into a glass with a salted rim.

name: Mai Tai
ingredients: Light and dark rum, lime juice, orange liqueur, orgeat syrup.
instructions: Shake all ingredients with ice and strain into a glass. Garnish with a lime wheel.

name: Caipirinha
instructions: Muddle lime and sugar in a glass, add cachaça and ice, then stir.

name: Negroni
instructions: Stir all ingredients with ice and strain into a glass. Garnish with an orange twist.

name: Pisco Sour
ingredients: Pisco, lime juice, simple syrup, egg white, bitters.
instructions: Shake pisco, lime juice, simple syrup, and egg white with ice. Strain and add bitters on top.

name: Singapore Sling
ingredients: Gin, cherry brandy, Benedictine, pineapple juice, lime juice, grenadine.
instructions: Shake all ingredients with ice and strain into a glass. Garnish with a cherry.

name: Mojito
ingredients: White rum, lime, mint, sugar, soda water.
instructions: Muddle mint, lime, and sugar. Add rum and ice, top with soda water, and stir.

name: Gin and Tonic
instructions: Pour gin and tonic water over ice, garnish with a lime wedge.

name: Pina Colada
ingredients: White rum, coconut cream, pineapple juice.
instructions: Blend all ingredients with ice until smooth. Serve in a chilled glass.

name: Moscow Mule
instructions: Pour vodka and ginger beer over ice, squeeze lime juice, and stir.
